column5: Beautiful 2 bed 2.5 bath Midtown / Downtown HOUSTON, Texas Condo Sleeps 6. Location is right in the middle of everything Houston is known for: Incredibly close (see aerial photo for location!) Toyota Center, Minute Maid, Convention Center, Dynamo BBVA Stadium, Theater District, Downtown Aquarium, Medical Center & Museum District. Midtown is known for its bar & restaurant scene!
column8: Designer Condo Downtown Houston TX restaurant/bars
